Package model

Class Task

java.lang.Object
model.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The class is a blueprint of every task. It enables to perform basic operations on tasks such as their edition and retrieving their data
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task​(java.lang.String title, Date dueDate, java.lang.String project)
      Constructor - creates the Task object based on the given title, date and project. It automatically sets the isCompleted property to false and assigns a unique and random ID to the task.
      Parameters:
      title -
      dueDate -
      project -
